mapper.insert: insert into products(no, seller_no, images, name, lcategory_no, scategory_no, add1_sido, add2_sigungu, add3_eubmyeon, add4_donglee, day_price, rentday_minimum, components, description, end_day) values(products_seq.nextval, 1, #{images}, #{name}, 2, 3, #{add1_sido}, #{add2_sigungu}, #{add3_eubmyeon}, #{add4_donglee}, #{day_price}, #{rentday_minimum}, #{components}, #{description}, #{end_day})
